H0.text: Abdominal is the cavity in the body whose organs are controlled by collateral ganglia.

H1.text: Cranial is the cavity in the body that collateral ganglia control organs in.

H2.text: Pelvic is the cavity in the body that is controlled by collateral ganglia.

H3.text: Cardiac is the cavity in the body whose organs are controlled by collateral ganglia.

A4.text: Neurons of the prevertebral ganglia, also called collateral ganglia, receive input from the splanchnic nerves and innervate organs of the abdomen and pelvis.
